snippet.title: LUNA The Shadow Dust Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
A classical style Point & Click Puzzle Adventure
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/465100

LUNA The Shadow Dust is an award-winning, fully hand-animated Puzzle Adventure game. Together, a young boy and his companion explore a broken magical world that awaits illumination, solving puzzles and tracing back the memories of old.
Brought to life with visually stunning, wordless cinematics, experience an emotional journey of courage and hope.

Developed by Lantern Studio, an indie team of four.

Website: https://www.lantern-studio.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LanternStudio_
Facebook: https://facebook.com/lanternstudiogames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lanternstud...
